## JsPlumbInstance.rotate() method

Sets rotation for the element to the given number of degrees (not radians). A value of null is treated as a rotation of 0 degrees.  rotate

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rotate(element: T["E"], rotation: number, _doNotRepaint?: boolean): RedrawResult;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | T\["E"\] | Element to rotate |
|  rotation | number | Amount to totate |
|  \_doNotRepaint | boolean | For internal use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RedrawResult](./core.redrawresult)
